column4: i'm having trouble getting my ethernet card to work properly. currently ping drops lots of packets. It's a realtek rtl8111/8168b on the motherboard and I have changed the driver to the realtek on, but that didn't help
any ideas on what to try?
the main problem is that it's very very very slow at the moment
try disabling ipv6 if you don't use it, also try a different cable
